userStories.title: Create README.md (English & Chinese)
userStories.description: As a new developer or learner, I want to read a README file in my preferred language so that I can understand the project's purpose.
acceptanceCriteria: Both files contain project title and 'Vibe Coding' focus.
Both describe the Agentic architecture (Ralph Loop).
Verify Markdown renders correctly for both.

userStories.title: Sync to Remote
userStories.description: As the project owner, I want to push my local changes to the remote repo, overriding any conflicts, so that the remote reflects my current work.
acceptanceCriteria: Local commits pushed to origin/main (or current branch).
Use force push if necessary (`git push --force`).
